column4: i downloaded the cd from ububtu and burned it, then rebooted, I have the option of using ubuntu disc to boot, i do, ubuntu freezes after the nifty graphic, now winxp will not boot even in safe mode!!! this is a bad first experience for me an linux...
so i guess i didn't ask a question, how do i get my pc back?
boot a xp live cd. and use the fixmbr/fixboot command perhaps to see ifwindows can fix itself.
